file_content.text: Na-TaK tells me everything is orange parallel, thanks to you. That's good, right?
You'll find Major Cobus with the fleet. I'm sure he'll know what the Gree need you to do.
Na-TaK is worried Asation will be yellow concave soon. Please, do what you can to help the Gree.
Republic steward does not comprehend. This unit's makers require instant alleviation, or all is yellow concave!
Please, Na-TaK, try to calm down. I'm sure everything will be black and blue soon--
Republic steward is attempting verbal wordplay. This is most disproportionate at this interval!
The Supreme Chancellor's squad! What luck--I was ready to send out messengers.
Master Jedi! If half the stories about you are true, the Gree have nothing to fear.
Master Jedi! It's an honor to meet the person who recruited the entire Rift Alliance.
Major! I'm so glad you're here. See, Na-TaK? The Republic's finest, come to help.
Captain! Oh, thank goodness you're here. The SIS had given up tracking you down.
Minister Sosa, special envoy to the Gree Enclave. We have a crisis that requires the Republic's immediate response. Supreme Chancellor Saresh recommended you by name.
I'm honored to help the Republic in any crisis.
Whatever you need.
Whatever the situation, I'm certain we can resolve it.
Please, calm yourselves.
An orange vertex is our immense desire, gentle sentient.
Havoc Squad is always ready and willing, ma'am.
Understood.
You can tell the Chancellor I've been dropping her name a lot, too.
That's sweet of her.
I'm... sure I will.
You had some trouble with your machinery on Coruscant, right?
The Gree sound familiar.
All who serve the makers recollect you, black bisector. Coruscant is all orange parallel thanks to your purple vertex!
I've been in a lot of enclaves. Remind me which one is the Gree?
The Gree?
Our very old and very advanced allies. They use Basic in terms that they understand. It's our job to try and keep up.
Your droid sounds a few bolts short of a motivator.
That droid is fried.
It's how the Gree speak Basic. The colors and the geometry all mean something... I'm just not sure what.
The trouble is on the Gree world of Asation. Their droid military forces have been overwhelmed. They say the jungles are full of... what did you call them, Na-TaK?
Green perpendiculars. And blue scalene, and white convex--all is yellow concave if you do not accelerate!
In any case, Major Cobus is in command. He's used to more... unorthodox missions, and he can explain further. Can I tell him to expect you?
Whatever's threatening the Gree, I'll put a stop to it.
You can both relax.
I look forward to hearing the major's explanations.
This should be interesting.
He's really the perfect officer for an operation like this. He even did a month-long tour with the Voss.
Tell the major we're armed and ready for deployment.
On the double.
We are truly advantageous to have such a bisector. I wish most purple tangent for you, sentient.
What Na-TaK said, I'm sure.
An unorthodox mission means an unorthodox reward, I hope.
If the pay is good.
You will be compensated profusely, sentient. Gree technology is red equilateral!
I'm not signing up for anything orange, yellow or otherwise until I know more.
He better have answers.
Don't worry. Integration with local military forces is the major's specialty. He'll explain everything.
The shuttle can get you to the fleet, and from there to Major Cobus's ship. Good luck, and thank you.
Too weird. [Refuse quest]
I'm sorry, I don't have time to talk. I'm trying to figure out what it means to be white scalene....
